'''''Vinyar Tengwar 16''''' is the sixteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|15|17}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Melkor Descending into Arda" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "The Associative: A 'Problematic' Quenya Noun Case Explained" — Patrick H. Wynne
* "How Do You Say 'Answering Machine' in Quenya?" — Arden R. Smith
* "Transitions in Translations: Elvish is Fin(n)ished" (column) — Arden R. Smith
